summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for, the defense of Louis J. Forbes, Chief of Police of the City of Seattle, and Robert R. Herbert, a police officer, in a certain suit instituted in the Superior Court of the State of Washington, for King County, by Harry Willis, as plaintiff, against Cindarella Boot Shops, Inc., a corporation, Behor Piha, Max Block, H. H. Lappe, Robert R. Herbert, Louis J. Forbes, as Chief of Police of the City of Seattle, and National Surety Company, a corporation, as defendants.
